reg_info.act_under: Electricity Act, 1998   Loi de 1998 sur l'électricité

content.content: 1. The following are other objects of the IESO for the purposes of clause 6 (1) (s) of the Act: 1. To plan, manage and implement the smart metering initiative or any aspect of the initiative. 2. To oversee, administer and deliver the smart metering initiative or any aspect of the initiative. 3. To establish and enforce standards and criteria relating to the reliability of transmission systems. 4. To engage in activities that facilitate incremental changes in electricity consumption by consumers or classes of consumers, by means of contract-based rebates, refunds or offsetting payments related to electricity costs associated with the incremental changes.
content.raw_html:
1. The following are other objects of the IESO for the purposes of clause 6 (1) (s) of the Act:

1. To plan, manage and implement the smart metering initiative or any aspect of the initiative.

2. To oversee, administer and deliver the smart metering initiative or any aspect of the initiative.

3. To establish and enforce standards and criteria relating to the reliability of transmission systems.

4. To engage in activities that facilitate incremental changes in electricity consumption by consumers or classes of consumers, by means of contract-based rebates, refunds or offsetting payments related to electricity costs associated with the incremental changes.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
